```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(spatialEco)
library(here)
library(terra)
```

```{r}
elevation <- rast(here("data", "elevation"))
heat_load_index <- hli(elevation)
hierarchical_slope_position <- hsp(elevation)
diurnal_heat_index <- dahi(elevation)
topographic_position <- tpi(elevation, scale = 7)
sol_rad_aspect <- trasp(elevation)
terrain_ruggedness <- tri(elevation, s = 7)
ruggedness_vector <- vrm(elevation, s= 7)
```


```{r}
writeRaster(heat_load_index, filename = here("data", "heat_load_index.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(hierarchical_slope_position, filename = here("data", "hierarchical_slope_position.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(diurnal_heat_index, filename = here("data", "diurnal_heat.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(topographic_position, filename = here("data", "topographic_position.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(sol_rad_aspect, filename = here("data", "sol_rad_aspect.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(terrain_ruggedness, filename = here("data", "terrain_ruggedness.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
writeRaster(ruggedness_vector, filename = here("data", "ruggedness_vector.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
```
